task.title: Email Server Configuration
task.shortdesc: Follow these steps to configure the SMTP server that RemoteTM uses for sending email.

context.p: RemoteTM sends email notifications in these cases:

ul.li: When a new user is added, to provide new credentials
When TMX files are imported, to deliver import results
When a password reset is requested, to provide a custom reset link

step.cmd: Login as a user with "System Administrator" privileges.
Click Settings Email Server in main toolbar.
step.stepresult: The Email Server dialog appears: Email Server Dialog

step.cmd: Enter the name or IP of the SMTP server In the SMTP Server text input.
Enter the port number in which the SMTP server accepts requests in the Port text input.
Enter the user name for the SMTP server in the SMTP User text input.
Enter the password for the user selected in previous step in the SMTP Password text input.
Enter the email address used for sending notifications in the Send From text input.
If necessary, adjust the URL of the RemoteTM server in the RemoteTM Server text input. This field is automatically populated by RemoteTM.
Check the Authentication Required check box if your SMTP server requires authentication.
Check the Use TLS check box if your SMTP server requires TLS/SSL protocols.

taskbody.result: The updated email server configuration is stored in RemoteTM server.
